data.name: CertificateNotFoundInStore
data.value: No certificate was found in the certificate store with thumbprint {0}

data.name: CreatingContextsWarning
data.value: Creating context for each subscription accessible by account '{0}'.

data.name: DefaultContextMissing
data.value: The default context can no longer be found; please run 'Get-AzContext -ListAvailable' to see all available contexts, 'Select-AzContext' to select a new default context, or 'Connect-AzAccount' to login with a new account.

data.name: FileLockFailure
data.value: Could not acquire access to file '{0}' please try again in a few minutes.

data.name: IllegalPath
data.value: Illegal characters in path.

data.name: InvalidCertificate
data.value: Invalid certificate format. Publish settings may be corrupted. Use Get-AzurePublishSettingsFile to download updated settings

data.name: InvalidDnsName
data.value: "{0}" is an invalid DNS name for {1}

data.name: InvalidFilePath
data.value: A valid file path must be provided.

data.name: NoContextNameForSubscription
data.value: Unable to get context name for subscription with ID '{0}'.

data.name: NoInternetConnection
data.value: Please connect to internet before executing this cmdlet

data.name: NoTokenFoundWarning
data.value: Failed to get token for account '{0}', please run Connect-AzAccount to login for {0} if you need to use this account.

data.name: NullDataStore
data.value: A valid implementation of IDataStore must be provided.

data.name: ProfileLockReadDisposed
data.value: Attempted to read from the Azure PowerShell context after it was disposed. Please reload the module and try this operation again.

data.name: ProfileLockReadRecursion
data.value: Attempted to read from the Azure PowerShell context while it was in use. Please reload the module and try this operation again.

data.name: ProfileLockWriteDisposed
data.value: Attempted to write to the Azure PowerShell context after it was disposed. Please reload the module and try this operation again.

data.name: ProfileLockWriteRecursion
data.value: Attempted to write to the Azure PowerShell context while reading from the context Please reload the module and try this operation again.

data.name: ProfileNotInitialized
data.value: The Azure PowerShell context has not been properly initialized. Please import the module and try again.

data.name: ServiceNameExists
data.value: The provided service name {0} already exists, please pick another name

data.name: SessionLockReadDisposed
data.value: Attempted to read from the Azure PowerShell Session after it was disposed. Please reload the module and try this operation again.

data.name: SessionLockReadRecursion
data.value: Attempted to read from the Azure PowerShell Session while it was in use. Please reload the module and try this operation again.

data.name: SessionLockWriteDisposed
data.value: Attempted to write to the Azure PowerShell Session after it was disposed. Please reload the module and try this operation again.

data.name: SessionLockWriteRecursion
data.value: Attempted to write to the Azure PowerShell Session while reading from the session. Please reload the module and try this operation again.

data.name: SessionNotInitialized
data.value: The Azure PowerShell session has not been properly initialized. Please import the module and try again.

data.name: UnableToCreateContextForSubscription
data.value: Unable to create a context for subscription with ID '{0}.

data.name: UnreadableStream
data.value: Cannot read the file at '{0}'. Please ensure that you have appropriate access to this file and try executing this cmdlet again in a few minutes.

data.name: UnwritableStream
data.value: Cannot write to the file at '{0}'. Please ensure that you have appropriate access to this file and try executing this cmdlet again in a few minutes.

data.name: UserMissingFromSharedTokenCache
data.value: User '{0}' was not found in the shared token cache; removing all contexts with this user.
